Function to read and crop a netcdf file
```{r}
ERA_read <- function(x) {
  nc <- ncdf4::nc_open(x)
  var.name <- names(nc[['var']])[1]
  ncdf4::nc_close(nc)
 dat <- rotate(brick(x, varname= var.name))
 datC <- crop(dat, ext)
  return(datC)
}
```


```{r}

ERA_t_79 <- ERA_read(ERA5.file2)
```
